name: Soap Gift Pack - 10 pack, plus Free Shipping
description: 10 natural handmade soaps at a special discount price, plus Free Shipping. Package Includes: - Almonds And Cherry Blossoms - Spearmint Zing! - Coconut Dream - Vanilla & Oats - Cinnamon Almond Burst - Good Morning Mango - Ocean Myst - Cranberry, Vanilla & Peach - Key Lime Pie - Citrus Sunrise These soaps smell good enough to eat, and will keep you smiling with every sniff. Our soaps are organic handmade with olive oil & shea butter. We use only the finest and freshest ingredients; they not only nourish the body but also awaken the senses! name: Spearmint Zing!  3 Pack
description: Special price 3 bars for $12! This sweet refreshing blend of mint, olive oil & shea butter will perk you up and leave you feeling rejuvenated & fresh. These soaps smell good enough to eat, and will keep you smiling with every sniff, and the kids love 'em. Our soaps are organic handmade with olive oil & shea butter. We use only the finest and freshest ingredients; they not only nourish the body but also awaken the senses! Ingredients: Olive Oil, Water, Coconut Oil, Sodium Hydroxide, Organic Palm Oil, Soy Oil, Sunflower Oil, Shea Butter, Spearmint Essential Oil, Chromium Oxide, Spirulina Powder. May Also Contain Natural Vitamin E. Bar soap sizes are approx. 4-5 oz. measuring approx 2.5" x 3.25" x 1". Our soaps are created and inspired with these items in mind: freshness, quality, premium ingredients and your health. Questions or comments always welcomed, email us at: zoiefresh@yahoo.com.
